title: Pregnant Lucy Mecklenburgh joins her fiancé Ryan Thomas at Alton Towers Scarefest
text:
They recently revealed they are expecting a baby boy.

And Lucy Mecklenburgh and Ryan Thomas looked over the moon as they attended the launch of Alton Towers Scarefest in Stoke On Trent on Friday.

The couple attended the spooky event with Ryan's daughter Scarlett, 10, who was seen sweetly posing with her dad.

Bumping along: Lucy Mecklenburgh and Ryan Thomas looked over the moon as they attended the launch of Alton Towers Scarefest in Stoke On Trent on Friday

Cute: The couple attended the spooky event with Ryan's daughter Scarlett, 10, who was seen sweetly posing with her dad

Former TOWIE star Lucy, 28, revealed her growing baby bump in a tight black tee paired with denim jeans and trainers for the event.

The glowing star accessorised with a monochrome check coat and leather handbag as she and Ryan, 35, posed with some zombie actors.

Ryan looked casually cool in a gold printed padded jacket and fawn trousers, paired with a baseball cap.

His adorable daughter Scarlett, who he shares with ex Tina O'Brien, looked stylish in a grey hoodie and jeans as she beamed.

OMG: Ryan looked freaked out as he and former soap star Chris Fountain got into the event

Oh: Corrie's Lucy Fallon looked animated as she made her way into the event

The event proved to be a star-studded affair with Corrie's Lucy Fallon and TOWIE's Shelby Tribble among the stars getting spooked at the attraction.

On Sunday, Lucy shared a sweet video of the moment she and Ryan discovered the sex of the baby as she looked overjoyed at the news.

Ryan, meanwhile, made the announcement with a photo of himself and Lucy, clad in blue swimwear, cradling her bump. He wrote: 'Blue is for.....?'

In the video Lucy shared on Instagram, Ryan was reduced to tears when he discovered they were having a baby boy.

Lucy, who clutched the papers revealing their baby's sex in her hands, brought her hand to her mouth in shock when she gazed down at the paper.

Glam: Lucy joined Love Island star Georgia Steel at the star-studded event

Co-stars: Lucy posed up with Colson Smith and a spooky friend

Banter: TOWIE's Shelby Tribble and Sam Mucklow were all smiles

Overwhelmed with joy, Ryan punched his hands in the air, hugged Lucy and gave her a kiss on the cheek.

Within minutes of revealing the gender, a slew of their celebrity pals rushed to congratulate them. Samia Longchambon wrote: 'Aww a little boy! Congrats guys.'

Dean Gaffney joked: 'As much as we take the p**s out of each other, your photo skills are on point...' Ashley James commented with a slew of love heart emojis.

Lucy took to Instagram on the evening of her 28th birthday to announce she is expecting her first child with Ryan and debuted her blossoming baby bump in a figure-hugging red dress

The ex Corrie star gifted Lucy a baby grow, which they held up for the snap as they revealed that they are set to welcome their first baby together, two months after he proposed during a romantic trip to Italy, following two years of dating.

Alongside the heartwarming shot, the reality star wrote: Best birthday present 'I've ever had. Love you @ryanthomas84,' with a baby emoji and a heart emoji included in the caption.

Ryan also raises daughter Scarlett with his ex-girlfriend and former Coronation Street co-star Tina O'Brien, 35, who he was in a relationship with for six years.
description: Lucy Mecklenburgh and Ryan Thomas looked over the moon as they attended the launch of Alton Towers Scarefest in Stoke On Trent on Friday.
